Reviews.Title: Very portable fantastic computer for the money
Reviews.Author: Justin Z
Reviews.Content: Very good 14 inch touchscreen laptop. Weighs about 5 lbs so I can carry it with me in my backpack. For sub $500 touchscreen laptop, this is a ideal choice for for basic computing and multitasking. Not a gaming machine, but it can handle some modern games on low settings.ProsBattery life. Usually gets 5-6 hours under normal usage.Touchscreen display is great for navigation in Windows 8.Inexpensive Touch screen laptop for regular use2 USB 3.0 portsBluetoothCons of Dell Inspiron 14R (5437) (i14RMT-7222sLV)No back-lit keyboard.

ProductInfo.Features:
Core i3-3227U Processor 1.9 GHz
4 GB DDR3L SDRAM
500GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
14.1-Inch Touch Screen
Windows 8
ProductInfo.Name: Dell Inspiron 14.1-Inch Touchscreen Ultrabook (i14RMT-7222sLV)
